New Records: Bailey Ober had his worst career outing, surrendering nine earned runs in two innings
Key Match Events: Atlanta Braves rally with multiple runs in the second inning
Whit Merrifield's single and Jorge Soler's walk set up the rally
Marcell Ozuna and Travis d'Arnaud hit key home runs
Max Fried's strong performance after rain delay
Post-Match Reflections: Rocco Baldelli noted the bullpen's fatigue and the impact of the rain delay
Byron Buxton is nearing a rehab assignment
Miscellaneous Highlights: Significant weather delay with a rainbow
